title: Create navigation pages with consistent styling and integrate additional image renders

requirements.summary: Create dedicated page components for About, Technology, Features, and Contact with consistent MOBIUS-NOVA styling
acceptanceCriteria: About page component created with consistent MOBIUS-NOVA styling
Technology page component created with consistent MOBIUS-NOVA styling
Features page component created with consistent MOBIUS-NOVA styling
Contact page component created with consistent MOBIUS-NOVA styling
All pages use the same color palette, typography, and layout patterns as LandingPage
All pages include the Footer component for consistent navigation

file_operations.description: Create About page component with dark gradient background, MOBIUS-NOVA brand colors (Liquid Silver, Nova Gold, Deep Space Black, Cosmic Blue, Solar White), Montserrat font family, and consistent spacing/layout patterns matching the LandingPage. Include the Footer component for consistent navigation. Wire in the generated image frontend/public/assets/generated/about-background.dim_1200x800.png as a background or hero element.

Create Technology page component with dark gradient background, MOBIUS-NOVA brand colors, Montserrat font family, and consistent spacing/layout patterns matching the LandingPage. Include the Footer component for consistent navigation. Wire in the generated image frontend/public/assets/generated/technology-hero.dim_1200x600.png as a hero section image showcasing the multi-modal energy system.

Create Features page component with dark gradient background, MOBIUS-NOVA brand colors, Montserrat font family, and consistent spacing/layout patterns matching the LandingPage. Include the Footer component for consistent navigation. This page can expand on the capabilities shown in the FeaturesSection component with more detailed information.

Create Contact page component with dark gradient background, MOBIUS-NOVA brand colors, Montserrat font family, and consistent spacing/layout patterns matching the LandingPage. Include the Footer component for consistent navigation. Wire in the generated image frontend/public/assets/generated/contact-header.dim_1200x400.png as a header image with communication theme. Include contact form or contact information consistent with the brand styling.

requirements.summary: Implement React Router for navigation between landing page and newly created pages
acceptanceCriteria: React Router configured in the application
Routes defined for landing page and all new pages
Footer navigation links updated to use React Router Link components
Browser URL updates when navigating between pages

file_operations.description: Replace the direct LandingPage render with React Router configuration. Import BrowserRouter, Routes, and Route from react-router-dom. Define routes for the landing page (path '/'), About page (path '/about'), Technology page (path '/technology'), Features page (path '/features'), and Contact page (path '/contact'). Wrap all routes in BrowserRouter and Routes components.

Update the Footer navigation links to use React Router Link components instead of href anchors. Import Link from react-router-dom and replace the anchor tags for About, Technology, Features, and Contact with Link components pointing to their respective routes (/about, /technology, /features, /contact). Maintain the existing visual design and styling without any changes to the Footer's appearance.

requirements.summary: Display user-provided image renders on appropriate pages as static assets from frontend/public/assets/generated
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images are integrated into the appropriate page components
Images are served from frontend/public/assets/generated directory
Images maintain consistent styling with the rest of the pages
Images are responsive and properly sized for their context

file_operations.description: Generated image file for Technology page hero showcasing multi-modal energy system. This file will be created by the image generation system and referenced in TechnologyPage.tsx.
Generated image file for About page background with energy innovation theme. This file will be created by the image generation system and referenced in AboutPage.tsx.
Generated image file for Contact page header with communication theme. This file will be created by the image generation system and referenced in ContactPage.tsx.
